snippet: Dreadlocked German Dustin Brown will have the chance to follow up last year's Wimbledon heroics after being handed a wildcard for the championships on Wednesday....
lead_paragraph: Dreadlocked German Dustin Brown will have the chance to follow up last year's Wimbledon heroics after being handed a wildcard for the championships on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Nadal Conqueror Brown Handed Wimbledon Wildcard
headline.main: Nadal Conqueror Brown Handed Wimbledon Wildcard
